productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 7,533 ratings 4.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids liked it so much I bought a second one
reviews.reviewText: Great for car rides! I bought one originally and my two kids would fight over it in the car. These are reasonably priced enough that I bought a second one. We have had these for a few months now. These give them the perfect opportunity for creativity on car rides or to practice writing. They are a medium size which is perfect for the car. Not too small where they can still draw/write enough, but not too big to where it takes up too much car space when they are not in use. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super cute, perfect size for my kid. Good quality and lots of fun

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size for travel, questionable quality
reviews.reviewText: Updated review 5/31/23- I originally rated this product with 3 stars due to the choking hazard and used state of the product. Shortly after posting my review, the company acknowledged my concerns, refunded my money, and ensured that my concerns would be addressed. They were very attentive and were very helpful. Because of the great customer service I have increased my rating to 4 stars due to the stellar customer service.I just received this product yesterday with the intention of putting it in my son's Easter basket so he would have it for our upcoming 6-hour road trip. Immediately upon opening the package, something fell out and I realized that the magnet on one of the shape pieces had fallen off. I was able to stick it back on but will go back and superglue it before giving to my son to ensure it doesn't fall off when he is using it since that is a definite choking hazard.The screen appeared to be used but after a few slides of the eraser it came "mostly" clean. The colors are not as bright as advertised and and are more of a dull shade. I like that it came with a travel bag and that the pen is attached to the board by a string to keep it from getting lost. The magnet design pieces just slide into designated holes and are otherwise not attached. I will most likely just remove those until my son gets older due to the choking hazard listed above and to prevent them from getting lost.Overall, this is a pretty cheap product, both in cost and quality so I guess you get what you pay for. I wouldn't feel comfortable gifting this due to the questionable quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Works great for the price. Great for car rides or just at home. The backpack is kinda useless for a toddler but maybe an older kid would like. The more it gets used the less clear it is once erased but that's ok, little one doesn't care and still loves it. Totally worth the price for a little gift or travel toy

reviews.reviewText: Love it. My 18month old learned how to use it quickly, but the little pieces get lost easily lol. Pen is attached so you can’t lose that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for. It works well for now. Does feel cheap, the plastic is thin.

Product a described. Comes with a little bag. Nice and light and compact for travel but not too small either. Happy with my purchase.
Bought for my toddler niece. Its holding up well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Much smaller than expected and poor build quality given the price.
reviews.reviewText: As you can see in the photo, it is very small and the magnets are not even attached!!!They do show the measurements on the Amazon site but the picture with people is misleading.
The product was of very poor quality.Wanted to return it but have had trouble finding out where to return it to .
